name: Lenz
description:
Bolts from this Corpus bow deliver a one-two punch of an icy pulse, followed by a conventional explosion. Excess ammo picked up for other weapons will be converted into charges for the Lenz. 
Warning: Safety-protocols do not exist on this prototype.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.5.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors not making the strap on Lenz's quiver go invisible.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Hotfix 21.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed shooting Frost’s Snow Globe from the outside with the Lenz resulting in the Blast damage applying twice instead of Cold then Blast.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors only creating 1 Lenz explosion instead of 3.

name: Lanka
description: The Lanka fires a high velocity projectile through magnetic induction.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Lanka not being able to hit ragdolls.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Increased the damage for all Sniper Rifles (apart from Lanka) in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Lanka’s combo meter not properly updating when an enemy is slain.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sniper rifle combo multiplier not working properly on the Lanka.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Lanka’s fire rate not properly updating with fire rate Mods.

name: Dera
description: The DERA is a repeater that fires super-heated plasma.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.0.6 + 22.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed 'daily Focus cap reached' messages not taking the Operator Focus into consideration.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clan-chat moderators text showing in purple in Dojos; they will not lurk with stealthy kicks the same as they do in Clan chat.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a potential issue causing Warframe’s process to lag considerably after the game shuts down.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Users with Chat Moderation privileges have their chat messages display in Purple Text.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that allowed the Dera to retain damage bonuses from Volt’s Electric Shield, resulting in higher than normal damage.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.2
patchlogs.changes: Adjusted the draw radius and shot radius on Paris, Paris Prime, Cernos, and Daikyu. Before, players were able to hear you draw your bow from considerably far away distances that would give away your position.

name: Flux Rifle
description: Laser Rifle with Corpus safe-guards removed.

name: Supra
description: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.changes: Supra Vandal is now tradable.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with Supra Vandal’s tinting.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes: Fixed reload sounds on the Supra.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Supra being unable to use the Rifle Ammo Mutation Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Supra’s lensflare effect showing through walls.

name: Ogris
description: Ogris fires detonite-infused casings.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Castanas, Talons and Ogris projectiles being destroyed in flight doing 4x damage with 2x radius in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Updated the Ogris and Grineer Napalm’s fire FX.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed unintentional DOT from Adhesive Blast on the Ogris, Penta, Secura Penta, and Tonkor.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed enemies and allies floating upwards when hit by an Ogris with Adhesive Blast.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.10.4 Operation Rathuum.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed other players getting damaged by projectiles (i.e Ogris)  after Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors expires.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an extended delay that occurs with the Ogris when attempting to fire the weapon after cancelling a charged shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue enabling players to mantle recently fired Ogris rockets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed a bug where the Adhesive Blast mod would cause Ogris missiles to pass through enemies, doors, loot-crates etc.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.4
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Ogris’ rockets not exploding properly when used with the Adhesive blast Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Fixed fire rate Mods not allowing charge weapons like the Ogris or Opticor to fire.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.16.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed missing explosion effect from Ogris.

name: Ignis
description: Ignis produces a stream of intense heat.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.13.3
patchlogs.changes: Ignis and Ignis Wraith are now usable in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ignis (and similar weapons) being able to damage friendly Gara's Spectrorage mirrors.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash when firing the Ignis while in Limbo’s Stasis.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.1+19.12.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Hyekka Master being able to hit Limbo in the Rift with her Ignis if there are other enemies around Limbo.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Hyekka Master and Scorch’s firing their Ignis’ too high.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.3.1 + 18.3.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an improper fire visual FX that would appear on the Ignis in the Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.2.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ignis model not looking properly when the weapon is stolen from the Drahk Master and placed on the ground.

name: Torid
description: Torid lobs a toxic payload.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed lingering Torid projectiles causing self-damage after Hall of Mirrors wears off.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the Torid not dealing DOT damage to impacted target as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/379733-bug-torid-enemies-hit-directly-not-damaged-by-clouds-3-months-old/

name: Simulor
description: Creates miniature gravitational singularities that can be used for scientific study or self-defense.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Simulor Orbs not stacking at all.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Limbo being able to attack enemies with the Simulor while within the Rift.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Simulor creating too many explosions when used with Mirage’s Hall of Mirrors and fire rate Mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Synoid Simulor not properly creating a vortex when used with Hall of Mirrors as a Client as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/524634-simulorsynoid-simulor-and-mirage-clones/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Simulor orbs not properly combining with each other when you are at max range.
